# hubAdmin

The goal of hubAdmin is to provide a set of utility functions for
administering hubverse Hubs.

This package is part of the [hubverse](https://hubverse.io) ecosystem,
which aims to provide a set of tools for infectious disease modeling
hubs to share and collaborate on their work.

## Installation

> \[!NOTE\]  
> If you have any problems with installation of package `V8` (more
> likely on Linux), please consult the [V8 installation
> instructions](https://github.com/jeroen/V8#installation).

### Latest

You can install the [latest version of hubAdmin from the
R-universe](https://hubverse-org.r-universe.dev/hubAdmin):

``` r
install.packages("hubAdmin", repos = c("https://hubverse-org.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
```

### Development

If you want to test out new features that have not yet been released,
you can install the development version of hubAdmin from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("hubverse-org/hubAdmin")
```

You can also [**view the development version
documentation**](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/dev/).

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Code of Conduct

Please note that the hubAdmin package is released with a [Contributor
Code of
Conduct](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). By
contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.

## Contributing

Interested in contributing back to the open-source Hubverse project?
Learn more about how to [get involved in the Hubverse
Community](https://hubverse.io/community/) or [how to contribute to the
hubAdmin
package](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/CONTRIBUTING.md).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`append_round()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/append_round.md)
  : Append one or more rounds to a config class object.

- [`create_config()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_config.md)
  :

  Create a `config` class object.

- [`create_model_task()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_model_task.md)
  :

  Create an object of class `model_task`

- [`create_model_tasks()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_model_tasks.md)
  :

  Create a `model_tasks` class object.

- [`create_output_type()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_output_type.md)
  :

  Create an `output_type` class object.

- [`create_output_type_mean()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_output_type_mean.md)
  [`create_output_type_median()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_output_type_mean.md)
  :

  Create a point estimate output type object of class `output_type_item`

- [`create_output_type_quantile()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_output_type_quantile.md)
  [`create_output_type_cdf()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_output_type_quantile.md)
  [`create_output_type_pmf()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_output_type_quantile.md)
  [`create_output_type_sample()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_output_type_quantile.md)
  :

  Create a distribution output type object of class `output_type_item`

- [`create_round()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_round.md)
  :

  Create an object of class `round`

- [`create_rounds()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_rounds.md)
  :

  Create a `rounds` class object.

- [`create_target_metadata()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_target_metadata.md)
  :

  Create a `target_metadata` class object.

- [`create_target_metadata_item()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_target_metadata_item.md)
  :

  Create an object of class `target_metadata_item`

- [`create_task_id()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_task_id.md)
  :

  Create an object of class `task_id`

- [`create_task_ids()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/create_task_ids.md)
  :

  Create a `task_ids` class object.

- [`download_tasks_schema()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/download_tasks_schema.md)
  : Download hubverse tasks schema from the hubverse schema repository.

- [`get_array_schema_paths()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/get_array_schema_paths.md)
  : Get potential paths to properties in a config file that can be
  arrays from a hubverse schema

- [`schema_autobox()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/schema_autobox.md)
  :

  Box elements of a `<config>` class object that can be arrays

- [`validate_config()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/validate_config.md)
  : Validate a hub config file against a hubverse schema

- [`validate_hub_config()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/validate_hub_config.md)
  : Validate Hub config files against hubverse schema.

- [`validate_model_metadata_schema()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/validate_model_metadata_schema.md)
  : Validate model-metadata-schema config file

- [`view_config_val_errors()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/view_config_val_errors.md)
  : Print a concise and informative version of validation errors table.

- [`write_config()`](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/reference/write_config.md)
  : Write config class object to a JSON file.

  files](https://hubverse-org.github.io/hubAdmin/articles/scripting-tasks-config.md):
